item.description:
Interact Event, Europeans In Boston, and DJ Francesco Spagna (UNITY, Baci & Abbracci, Heartbeats), 6one7 Productions and Lavazza

invite you to an Italian night

When in Rome...

Do as the Romans do:

* Drink complimentary Lavazza espresso,
sponsored by Espresso Plus (come early)
* Be fashionably late but not too late,
* Give compliments,
* Treat friends with signature drink “Roman Passion”,
* Take photos with Roman beauties
* Connect through music, and Italian ambiance
* Enjoy live percussion vibes by Joakin Eskasan
* Enjoy live modern performances
* Complimentary gifts in the décor of the space
* Dance to the house music vibe of Boston's DJ Francesco Spagna

Cover is $20, reduced cover of $15 may be possible (I have to look into this.)

Grazie mille!!!
item.how_to_find_us: We'll meet at the entrance. I'll provide more details later in the week.

group.name: The Boston Euro Social Meetup Group

item.name: When In Rome Italian Night
